name: Edison Ventures
overview:
Edison seeks opportunities where our skills, experience and relationships will contribute meaningfully to a companyâ€™s success.

Edison focuses on expansion stage, information technology companies in the Eastern United States .

Building successful growth companies and creating substantial equity value are Edison’s two goals. Their investment profile includes growth financings, management buyouts, acquisitions, and secondary stock purchases.
